body: I was skeptical at first, but it looks like the story is finally getting better. The MC and the purple-haired girl in a relationship, the collar, the other teacher getting literally jealous of the MC. I still think the secretary was kind of shoehorned into the story without any development, but whatever. Just get it right with the two teachers and we're good. I'm just glad to see the author slowly getting better.
Mrkagesawa this is a revenge webtoon and the mc is giving it in the best manner making them his after he got builled

Blue haird girl is sexy. I like her. In the past, it looked like she wanted to help him. Imo. The dog collar caught me off guard. Lmao. Brown haied girl is upset her man can't satisfy her anymore. You got a taste of big dick and now you cant stop thinking about it. 😂😂😂😂. I'm liking where this is going. 👌👌
This is a really good chapter
